QuestData.Title: Censers of Guidance
QuestData.Description:
The Forsworn are going to great lengths to prevent us from ascension.
They mobilize to stand in our way, to dismantle our chances to partake in our rituals.
They have stolen the resources we need to start our trial. Defeat them and retrieve the incense they carry so that we may continue on this path.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Incense of Guidance from Forsworn forces.
